title: Leaver Buster sucks
body: So basicly my clients keeps crashing while in starting menu or picking phase and the last time it happened it crashed me at the end of picking phase so it was like leaving a ranked game plus I got leaver buster...I relly think waiting 20 minutes before 5 games is a bit too much either make it shorter or less games, removing it would incouroge people to leave and that does no one any good so just reduce the timer or the amount of games you have to wait....

replies.body: The best way to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is by playing without any leaves.  I'm happy to help you troubleshoot whatever is causing the crash to prevent anymore lower priority queues.  I do need more information though on what's happening.  What do you mean exactly by crash and are there any error messages?  Are you using any third party programs that interact with league?  Let me know!
